author: Joseph Zucker
title: Video: Terrell Owens Starts Driveway Sit-Up Challenge, Tags LeBron James, More
description: Like many across the country and world, Hall of Fame wide receiver  Terrell Owens  is attempting to find ways to pass the time while social distancing...
content:
Daniel Shirey/Getty Images
Like many across the country and world, Hall of Fame wide receiver Terrell Owens is attempting to find ways to pass the time while social distancing. 
As a result, Owens launched the "COVID-19 Driveway Challenge" and tagged a numb… [+831 chars]
